text: Variety is an American magazine that covers entertainment. It was started by Sime Silverman in New York in 1905. It began as a weekly newspaper reporting on theater and vaudeville. In 1933, Daily Variety, based in Los Angeles, was started. It covers the motion-picture industry. The website Variety.com has entertainment news, reviews, box office results, cover stories, and video and photo galleries. There is also a credits database, production charts and calendar. It has archive content dating back to 1905. ==Related pages== * Hollywood Reporter ==Other websites== * Category:Media in the United States Category:Companies based in Los Angeles Category:1905 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in California
title: Variety (magazine)
